title.rendered: Lephalale FET College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Lephalale FET College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Lephalale FET College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Lephalale FET College based on the information provided within it.

Lephalale FET College Student Portal

Note: Lephalale FET College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Lephalale FET College Prospectus 2024

The Lephalale FET College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website www.ellisrascollege.co.za/

Lephalale FET College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
